title: Principles by Ray Dalio | Animated Book Summary | Top Principles

json.text: Principles by Ray Dalio
Ray Dalio is among the world's wealthiest people what are his secrets from his book principles?
You'll be able to learn from him and his experience with this book. You will understand that
Anyone can lead a successful?
Organization by having a set of core principles that are always there to keep them on the right path
Sometimes life can be tough and every day you may face some questions coming at you from every direction
That you may feel like you're trapped in a snow storm
When this times come it's impossible to tell which way you're supposed to turn
This is one of the main reasons you'll need guiding principles in your life
Like having a compass in the snowstorm
Being equipped with such principles means you'll always know exactly where you're headed
And what choices will keep you on that path? No matter the circumstances
Having your own principles will give you fundamental truths that you can apply to any problem. You'll face through your journey
One of the core life principles by Dahlia is that you must embrace reality and deal with it
What does this mean in short?
Dreams plus reality plus determination equals a successful life
Don't be fooled that life won't be messy and frustrating sometimes
This is why you must know that you have to be guided by your rational thinking not by your emotions
This is another core principle. You must know
The things will go wrong from time to time the most important thing in this moment is that you have to know that failure often
Provides ways to take a small break learn your lessons adapt and get back together
This is the way to evolve. This is the moment when you have to do your job and BAM
Remember that in our life. There's always a way to learn and improve
One other thing that's very important to take from this book is that we all need to have an
Ultimate goal in our minds and the best way to conquer this goal is to prioritize and narrow things down
Most people are making the mistake of reaching for too many goals all at once
The best thing that you can do is to choose wisely
By looking for your ultimate goal. If you feel that you don't have such a goal right now. No worries
It's never too late for you to learn some new skills to start a new education or to improve your current skills
If you want to have similar success like Dali, oh you must be radically
open-minded in this situation
You must know that your ego is your barrier and that you must overcome your ego if you want to be open-minded
You must know that you might not know the best way and to deal well with not knowing is more important what you know
The only thing that matters here is achieving your goal and not listening your ego about looking good in front of someone
May be the most important lesson in having a good relationship with work is to have radical truth and transparency at
Bridgewater associates radical truth applies to the executives as well
when a company is considering closing one of its divisions many executives decide to keep things quiet and
Only tell the employees at the last possible minute
Yep, Bridgewater, the senior managers held an employee meeting and were completely candid about the pending sale
Radical transparency is the same as radical truth
this means being open about the kind of behavior and work that management expects from employees and
vice-versa in
This small summary. We saw some of the best core principles of Ray Dalio and from his book
we understand that having core principles will help you make decisions at any time in your life when things are doing goods and
Also when things are looking really bad
You can take his principles or you can create your own principles. This depends on your personal preference
Remember that everyday you have a chance to learn something new
that you have the chance to get better at what you're doing and that you can learn from the mistakes you make
This is the way you'll achieve your ultimate goal and will fulfill your life
Read and grow
